description.full: With NCAA® Basketball 10 you can enjoy ultimate control over your team’s style of play, including real Motion Offensive Systems including the Dribble Drive, Princeton and Flex to name a few. See the game like never before, with authentic broadcasting presentations from the all-star announcing crews of Dick Vitale, Brad Nessler, and Erin Andrews of ESPN, and Gus Johnson and Bill Raftery of CBS Sports. From the broadcast table to the hardwood - it’s all there in NCAA® Basketball 10.  Some multi-player functionalities may no longer be supported.
